title: Whenever i go in game and load it goes to main menu screen saying to Reconnect 'cause of a crash?
body: So i was having an average game (blind pick normal game) and i locked in and all was well but then when everyone else loaded, my game went to the screen when it says you need to reconnect due to internet issues however it said the game crashed and whenever i tried to reconnect it did the same thing over and over again. Any help would be greatly appreciated. Thanks!

replies.body:
No worries, glad that fixed it :)

See you on the rift!

Hey there,

Are you currently running lolreplay/lolrecorder or any other third party tool that interfaces with the game? If so, this is probably the cause of your crash, please uninstall/disable these tools.

If not, have you tried [running a client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new)?
